Wichita.Scottish Rite Temple (Wichita, Kansas): The Wichita Scottish Rite Center, originally known as the Y.M.C.A. Building, is a historic building in the Romanesque style, located in Wichita, Kansas. Originally constructed in 1887-88 for the Young Men's Christian Association, the building was sold to the Scottish Rite Freemasons in 1898. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1972 as Scottish Rite Temple.
